fields.name: DisplayOnChart
fields.description: Indicates whether this threshold will be displayed on cost charts.

fields.name: NotificationSent
fields.description: Indicates the datetime when notifications were last sent for this threshold.

fields.name: PercentageThreshold
fields.description: The value of the percentage cost threshold.

fields.name: SendNotificationWhenExceeded
fields.description: Indicates whether notifications will be sent when this threshold is exceeded.

fields.name: ThresholdId
fields.description: The ID of the cost threshold item.
